action.name: Eye Rays
action.text:
The gazer shoots two of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one or two targets it can see within 60 feet of it:
7. Dazing Ray: The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the start of the gazer's next turn. While the target is charmed in this way, its speed is halved, and it has disadvantage on attack rolls.
2. Fear Ray: The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of the gazer's next turn.
3. Frost Ray: The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) cold damage.
4. Telekinetic Ray: If the target is a creature that is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be moved up to 30 feet directly away from the gazer. If the target is an object weighing 10 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, the gazer moves it up to 30 feet in any direction. The gazer can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a container.

monster.name: Gelatinous Cube
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

trait.name: Ooze Cube
trait.text: The cube takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw. Creatures inside the cube can be seen but have total cover. A creature within 5 feet of the cube can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the cube. Doing so requires a successful DC 12 Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 (3d6) acid damage. The cube can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time.

trait.name: Transparent
trait.text: Even when the cube is in plain sight, it takes a successful DC 15 Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a cube that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the cube's space while unaware of the cube is surprised by the cube.

action.name: Pseudopod
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (3d6) acid damage.

action.name: Engulf
action.text: The cube moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the cube enters a creature's space, the creature must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the cube. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw. On a failed save, the cube enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 10 (3d6) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, is restrained, and takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the cube's turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed creature moves with it. An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 12 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the cube.

trait.name: Assassinate
trait.text: During its first turn, Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Ghald scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
trait.text: Ghald can breathe air and water, but he needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
trait.text: Ghald can magically command any shark within 120 feet of him, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Sneak Attack
trait.text: Ghald deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Ghald's that isn't incapacitated and Ghald doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Ghald makes three attacks, one with his bite and two with his shortswords.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Garrote
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or Small creature against which Ghald has advantage on the attack roll. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against it.

trait.name: Stench
trait.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 ft. of the ghast must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the ghast's Stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Turn Defiance
trait.text: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 ft. of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Ghost
monster.speed: 0 ft., fly 40 ft. It can hover.
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monster.resist: acid, fire, lightning, thunder, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monster.languages: any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
trait.text: The ghost can see 60 ft. into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
trait.text: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Withering Touch
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
action.text: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Horrifying Visage
action.text: Each non-undead creature within 60 ft. of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages 1d4 _ 10 years. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a greater restoration spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

action.name: Possession (Recharge 6)
action.text: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 ft. of it must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies. The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the body. The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The ape makes two fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 50/100 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (7d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
trait.text: The badger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The badger makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.

trait.name: Echolocation
trait.text: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
trait.text: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: If the boar takes 10 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Tusk
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

monster.name: Gas Spore
monster.conditionImmune: blinded, deafened, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, prone

trait.name: Death Burst
trait.text: The gas spore explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage and become infected with a disease on a failed save. Creatures immune to the poisoned condition are immune to this disease. Spores invade an infected creature's system, killing the creature in a number of hours equal to 1d12+the creature's Constitution score, unless the disease is removed. In half that time, the creature becomes poisoned for the rest of the duration. After the creature dies, it sprouts 2d4 Tiny gas spores that grow to full size in 7 days.

trait.name: Eerie Resemblance
trait.text: The gas spore resembles a beholder. A creature that can see the gas spore can discern its true nature with a successful DC 15 Intelligence (Nature) check.

action.name: Touch
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 poison damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or become infected with the disease described in the Death Burst trait.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The crab can breathe air and water.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

monster.name: Giant Eagle
monster.languages: Giant Eagle, understands Common and Auran but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Sight
trait.text: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

monster.name: Giant Elk
monster.languages: Giant Elk, understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the elk moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Illumination
trait.text: The beetle sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 ft..

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) slashing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The frog can breathe air and water

trait.name: Standing Leap
trait.text: The frog's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
action.text: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 ft. of movement, exiting prone.

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the goat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
trait.text: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Rampage
trait.text: When the hyena reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the hyena can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Variant: Hold Breath
trait.text: The lizard can hold its breath for 15 minutes. (A lizard that has this trait also has a swimming speed of 30 feet.)

trait.name: Variant: Spider Climb
trait.text: The lizard can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Underwater Camouflage
trait.text: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The octopus can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Tentacles
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
action.text: A 20-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

monster.name: Giant Owl
monster.languages: Giant Owl, understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Flyby
trait.text: The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
trait.text: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The crocodile can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The crocodile makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the crocodile can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not grappled by the crocodile. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 (1d6) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the sea horse moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Ram
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
trait.text: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Water Breathing
trait.text: The shark can breathe only underwater.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
trait.text: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
trait.text: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
trait.text: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

action.name: Web (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

trait.name: Fire Absorption
trait.text: Whenever the giant strider is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to half the fire damage dealt.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Burst (Recharges 5-6)
action.text: The giant strider hurls a gout of flame at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The fire spreads around corners, and it ignites flammable objects in that area that aren’t being worn or carried.

trait.name: Aberrant Ground
trait.text: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the mouther is doughlike difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Gibbering
trait.text: The mouther babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't incapacitated. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a d8 to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The gibbering mouther makes one bite attack and, if it can, uses its Blinding Spittle.

action.name: Bites
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 17 (5d6) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the mouther.

action.name: Blinding Spittle (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The mouther spits a chemical glob at a point it can see within 15 feet of it. The glob explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of the mouther's next turn.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
trait.text: The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The vulture makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

monster.name: Githyanki Knight
monster.spells: mage hand, jump, misty step, nondetection, tongues, plane shift, telekinesis

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
trait.text:
The githyanki's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible) 3/day each: jump, misty step, nondetection (self only), tongues 1/day each: plane shift, telekinesis

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The githyanki makes two silver greatsword attacks.

action.name: Silver Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack. On a critical hit against a target in an astral body (as with the astral projection spell), the githyanki can cut the silvery cord that tethers the target to its material body, instead of dealing damage.

trait.name: Rampage
trait.text: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

monster.name: Githzerai Monk
monster.spells: mage hand, feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
trait.text:
The githzerai's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible) 3/day each: feather fall, jump, see invisibility, shield

trait.name: Psychic Defense
trait.text: While the githzerai is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The githzerai makes two unarmed strikes.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage. This is a magic weapon attack.

monster.name: Warlock of the Archfey
monster.spells: disguise self, mage armor, silent image, speak with animals, conjure fey, dancing lights, eldritch blast, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, vicious mockery, blink, charm person, dimension door, dominate beast, faerie fire, fear, hold monster, misty step, phantasmal force, seeming, sleep

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text:
The warlock’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save DC 15), requiring no material components:
At will: disguise self, mage armor (self only), silent image, speak with animals
1/day: conjure fey

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
The warlock is a 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:
Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, eldritch blast, friends, mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, vicious mockery
1st-5th level (3 5th-level slots): blink, charm person, dimension door, dominate beast, faerie fire, fear, hold monster, misty step, phantasmal force, seeming, sleep

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Misty Escape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
reaction.text: In response to taking damage, the warlock turns invisible and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains invisible until the start of its next turn or until it attacks, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

trait.name: Rampage
trait.text: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The gnoll makes two melee attacks with its spear or two ranged attacks with its longbow.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage, and the target’s speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Rampage
trait.text: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The gnoll makes two attacks, either with its glaive or its longbow, and uses its Incite Rampage if it can.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Glaive
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Incite Rampage (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: One creature the gnoll can see within 30 feet of it can use its reaction to make a melee attack if it can hear the gnoll and has the Rampage trait.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
trait.text: If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the gorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Hooves
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Petrifying Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

monster.name: Goristro
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Charge
trait.text: If the goristro moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 38 (7d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked prone.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
trait.text: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The goristro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: The goristro deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The goristro makes three attacks: two with its fists and one with its hoof.

action.name: Fist
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hoof
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Gore
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 45 (7d10 + 7) piercing damage.

monster.name: Fraz-Urb'luu
monster.immune: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing that is nonmagical
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning
monster.spells: alter self, detect magic, dispel magic, phantasmal force, confusion, dream, mislead, programmed illusion, seeming, mirage arcane, modify memory, project image

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text:
Fraz·Urb'luu's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 23). Fraz-Urb'luu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing his appearance), detect magic, dispel magic, phantasmal force 3/day each: confusion, dream, mislead, programmed illusion, seeming 1/day each: mirage arcane, modify memory, project image

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
trait.text: lfFraz-Urb'luu fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Fraz-Urb'luu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: Fraz-Urb' luu's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Undetectable
trait.text: Fraz-Urb'luu can't be targeted by divination magic, perceived through magical scrying sensors, or detected by abilities that sense demons or fiends.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Fraz-Urb'luu makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his fists.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage.

action.name: Fist
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Tail
legendary.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +16 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (2d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also grappled (escape DC 24). The grappled target is also restrained. Fraz-Urb'luu can grappie only one creature with his tail at a time.

legendary.name: Phantasmal Killer (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Fraz-Urb'luu casts phantasmal killer, no concentration required.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The dragon can breathe air and water.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Green Guard Drake

monster.name: Grimlock
monster.senses: blindsight 30 ft. or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Blind Senses
trait.text: The grimlock can't use its blindsight while deafened and unable to smell.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
trait.text: The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
trait.text: The grimlock has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Spiked Bone Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The grung can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Poisonous Skin
trait.text: Any creature that grapples the grung or otherwise comes into direct contact with the grung’s skin must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. A poisoned creature no longer in direct contact with the grung can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Standing Leap
trait.text: The grung's long jump is up to 25 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Variant: Grung Poison
trait.text:
Grung poison loses its potency 1 minute after being removed from a grung. A similar breakdown occurs if the grung dies. A creature poisoned by a grung can suffer an additional effect that varies depending on the grung’s skin color. This effect lasts until the creature is no longer poisoned by the grung.
Green. The poisoned creature can’t move except to climb or make standing jumps. If the creature is flying, it can’t take any actions or reactions unless it lands.
Blue. The poisoned creature must shout loudly or otherwise make a loud noise at the start and end of its turn.
Purple. The poisoned creature feels a desperate need to soak itself in liquid or mud. It can’t take actions or move except to do so or to reach a body of liquid or mud.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) poison damage.

monster.name: Guardian Portrait
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monster.languages: Common, plus up to two other languages
monster.spells: counterspell, crown of madness, hypnotic pattern, telekinesis

trait.name: Constructed Nature
trait.text: An animated object doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep. The magic that animates an object is dispelled when the construct drops to 0 hit points. An animated object reduced to 0 hit points becomes inanimate and is too damaged to be of much use or value to anyone.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
trait.text: The portrait is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the portrait must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text:
The portrait's innate spellcasting ability os Intelligence (spell save DC 12). The portrait can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
3/day each: counterspell, crown of madness, hypnotic pattern, telekinesis

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While the figure in the portrait remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal painting.

monster.name: Gynosphinx
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monster.spells: mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, detect magic, identify, shield, darkness, locate object, suggestion, dispel magic, remove curse, tongues, banishment, greater invisibility, legend lore

trait.name: Inscrutable
trait.text: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
The sphinx is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following wizard spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation • 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, shield • 2nd level (3 slots): darkness, locate object, suggestion • 3rd level (3 slots): dispel magic, remove curse, tongues • 4th level (3 slots): banishment, greater invisibility • 5th level (1 slot): legend lore

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The sphinx makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

legendary.name: Claw Attack

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

monster.name: Hobgoblin Devastator
monster.spells: acid splash, fire bolt, ray of frost, shocking grasp, fog cloud, magic missile, thunderwave, gust of wind, Melf's acid arrow, scorching ray, fireball, fly, lightning bolt, ice storm

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Volo's Guide to Monsters, p. 161

trait.name: Arcane Advantage
trait.text: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that target is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn’t incapacitated.

trait.name: Army Arcane
trait.text: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that causes damage or that forces other creatures to make a saving throw, it can choose itself and any number of allies to be immune to the damage caused by the spell and to succeed on the required saving throw.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
The hobgoblin is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): acid splash, fire bolt, ray of frost, shocking grasp
1st level (4 slots): fog cloud, magic missile, thunderwave
2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, Melf’s acid arrow, scorching ray
3rd level (3 slots): fireball, fly, lightning bolt
4th level (1 slot): ice storm

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6+1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8+1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

trait.name: Echolocation
trait.text: The hook horror can't use its blindsight while deafened.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
trait.text: The hook horror has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The hook horror makes two hook attacks.

action.name: Hook
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monster.name: Hook Horror Spore Servant
monster.resist: poison

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The spore servant makes two hyook attacks.

action.name: Hook
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

monster.name: Horned Devil
monster.resist: cold, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
trait.text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The devil makes three melee attacks: two with its fork and one with its tail. It can use Hurl Flame in place of any melee attack.

action.name: Fork
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or lose 10 (3d6) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 10 (3d6). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Hurl Flame
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

monster.name: Howling Hatred Priest
monster.spells: blade ward, gust (ee), light, prestidigitation, shocking grasp, feather fall, shield, witch bolt, dust devil (ee), gust of wind, gaseous form

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The priest can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It knows the following sorcerer spells:
• Cantrips (at will): blade ward, gust, light, prestidigitation, shocking grasp • 1st level (4 slots): featherfall, shield, witch bolt • 2nd level (3 slots): dust devil, gust of wind • 3rd level (2 slots): gaseous form

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The priest makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Guiding Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: As a bonus action, the initiate gains advantage on the next ranged attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The initiate can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

monster.name: Ice Devil Spear
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.name: Devil's Sight
trait.text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The devil makes two attacks: one with its spear and one with its tail.

action.name: Ice Spear
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, or for 1 minute, its speed is reduced by 10 feet; it can take either an action or a bonus action on each of its turns, not both; and it can't take reactions. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

action.name: Wall of Ice
action.text: The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter. When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is incapacitated. The creature then makes a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is incapacitated or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 17 (5d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

monster.name: Nimblewright
monster.resist: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks
monster.languages: understands one language known to its creator but can’t speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance.
trait.text: The nimblewright has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons.
trait.text: The nimblewright’s weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Repairable.
trait.text: As long as it has at least 1 hit point remaining, the nimblewright regains 1 hit point when a mending spell is cast on it.

trait.name: Sure-Footed.
trait.text: The nimblewright has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

action.name: Multiattack.
action.text: The nimblewright makes three attacks: two with its rapier and one with its dagger.

action.name: Rapier.
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Dagger.
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry.
reaction.text: The nimblewright adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the nimblewright must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The toad can breathe air or water.

trait.name: Cold Aura
trait.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the toad takes 3 (1d6) cold damage.

trait.name: Standing Leap
trait.text: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) cold damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the toad can't bite another target.

monster.name: Invisible Stalker
monster.conditionImmune: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monster.languages: Auran, understands Common but doesn't speak it

trait.name: Invisibility
trait.text: The stalker is invisible.

trait.name: Faultless Tracker
trait.text: The stalker is given a quarry by its summoner. The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The stalker also knows the location of its summoner.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The stalker makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Brute
trait.text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Izek hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Izek makes two attacks with his battleaxe.

action.name: Battleaxe
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8+4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10+4) when used with two hands.

action.name: Hurl Flame
action.text: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it catches fire.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Barbed Tail
reaction.text: When a creature provokes an opportunity attack from the ixitxachitl, the ixitxachitl can make the following attack instead of using its bite. Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

monster.name: Jamna Gleamsilver
monster.skill: Acrobatics +5, Deception +3, Insight +2, Perception +4, Persuasion +3, Stealth +7
monster.spells: mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, ray of frost, charm person, color spray, disguise self, longstrider

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: Jamna can take a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
trait.text: Jamna has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against magic.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
Jamna is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as her spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Jamna has the following spells prepared from the wizard spell list.
• Cantrips (at will): mage hand, minor illusion, prestidigitation, ray of frost • 1st level (3 slots): charm person, color spray, disguise self, longstrider

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Jamna attacks twice with her shortswords.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 9 (1d6 + 3) plus (1d6) piercing damage if the target is Medium or larger.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
action.text: For 1 minute, the knight can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 ft. of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its roll provided it can hear and understand the knight. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the knight is incapacitated.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: The knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Kraken
monster.immune: lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
monster.languages: understands Abyssal, Celestial, Infernal, and Primordial but can't speak, telepathy 120 ft.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The kraken can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
trait.text: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

trait.name: Siege Monster
trait.text: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The kraken makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. If the kraken takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Tentacle
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Fling
action.text: One Large or smaller object held or creature grappled by the kraken is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

action.name: Lightning Storm
action.text: The kraken magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
legendary.text: The kraken makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: The kraken uses Lightning Storm.

legendary.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

monster.name: Kraken Priest
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monster.spells: command, create or destroy water, control water, darkness, water breathing, water walk, call lightning, Evard's black tentacles

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The priest can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text:
The priest’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: command, create or destroy water
3/day each: control water, darkness, water breathing, water walk
1/day each: call lightning, Evard’s black tentacles

action.name: Thunderous Touch
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 27 (5d10) thunder damage.

action.name: Voice of the Kraken (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
action.text: A kraken speaks through the priest with a thunderous voice audible within 300 feet. Creatures of the priest’s choice that can hear the kraken's words (which are spoken in Abyssal, Infernal, or Primordial) must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Kuo-Toa Archpriest
monster.spells: guidance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy, detect magic, sanctuary, shield of faith, hold person, spiritual weapon, spirit guardians, tongues, control water, divination, mass cure wounds, scrying

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Otherwordly Perception
trait.text: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
trait.text: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
The kuo-toa is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy • 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, sanctuary, shield of faith • 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon • 3rd level (3 slots): spirit guardians, tongues • 4th level (3 slots): control water, divination • 5th level (2 slots): mass cure wounds, scrying

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The kuo-toa makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Scepter
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) lightning damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Kuo-Toa Whip
monster.spells: sacred flame, thaumaturgy, bane, shield of faith

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Otherwordly Perception
trait.text: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
trait.text: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text:
The kuo-toa is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:
• Cantrips (at will): sacred flame, thaumaturgy • 1st level (3 slots): bane, shield of faith

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The kuo-toa makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its pincer staff.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Pincer Staff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the kuo-toa can't use its pincer staff on another target.

monster.name: Lamia
monster.spells: disguise self, major image, charm person, mirror image, scrying, suggestion, geas

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: The lamia's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. At will: disguise self (any humanoid form), major image 3/day each: charm person, mirror image, scrying, suggestion 1/day: geas

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The lamia makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its dagger or Intoxicating Touch.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Intoxicating Touch
action.text: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: The target is magically cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws and all ability checks.

monster.name: Langdedrosa Cyanwrath
monster.resist: lightning

trait.name: Action Surge (Recharges on a Short or Long Rest)
trait.text: On his turn, Langdedrosa can take one additional action.

trait.name: Improved Critical
trait.text: Langdedrosa's weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Langdedrosa attacks twice, either with his greatsword or spear.

action.name: Greatsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20 ft.,/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: Langdedrosa breathes lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

monster.name: Lifferlas
monster.resist: blugdeoning, piercing

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While Lifferlas remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
trait.text:
A druid of the Emerald Enclave awakened the tree Lifferlas with a spell. Goldenfields is his home, its people his friends. Children like to carve their name and initials into his body and hang from his boughs, and he's happy with that.
Ideal: "I exist to protect the people and plants of Goldenfields." Bond: "Children are wonderful. I would do anything to make them feel happy and safe." Flaw: "I can't remember people's names and often get them mixed up."

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Lifferlas makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (3d6+4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The lizardfolk makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Club
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Javelin
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Spiked Shield
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
trait.text: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

trait.name: Skewer
trait.text: Once per turn, when the lizardfolk makes a melee attack with its trident and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage, and the lizardfolk gains temporary hit points equal to the extra damage dealt.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The lizardfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or trident or two melee attacks with its trident.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Trident
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monster.name: Maegera the Dawn Titan
monster.conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
monster.resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
trait.text: Maegera's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to damage from nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: Fire Aura
trait.text: At the start of each of Maegera's turns, each creature within 30 feet of it takes 35 (10d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature also takes 35 (10d6) fire damage from touching Maegera or from hitting it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it, and a creature takes that damage the first time on a turn that Maegera moves into its space. Nonmagical weapons that hit Maegera are destroyed by fire immediately after dealing damage to it.

trait.name: Fire Form
trait.text: Maegera can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing if fire could pass through that space.

trait.name: Illumination
trait.text: Maegera sheds bright light in a 120-foot radius and dim light in an additional 120 ft..

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text: Maegera's can innately cast fireball (spell save DC 19) at will, requiring no material components. Maegera's spell casting ability is Charisma.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: Maegera has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: Maegera makes three slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 35 (10d6) fire damage

legendary.name: Quench Magic
legendary.text: Maegera targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. Any resistence or immunity to fire damage that the target gains from a spell or magic item is suppressed. The effect lasts until the end of Maegera's next turn.

legendary.name: Smoke Cloud (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.text: Maegera exhales a billowing cloud of hot smoke and embers that fills a 60 feet cube. Each creature in the area takes 11 (2d10) fire damage. The cloud lasts until the end of Maegera's next turn. Creatures completely in the cloud are blinded and can't be seen.

legendary.name: Create Fire Elemental (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.text: Maegera's hit points are reduced by 50 as part of it separates and becomes a fire elemental with 102 hit points. The fire element appears in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of Maegera and acts on Maegera's initiative count. Maegera can't use this action if it has 50 hit points or fewer. The fire element obeys Maegera's commands and fights until destroyed.

monster.name: Magma Mephit
monster.spells: heat metal

trait.name: Death Burst
trait.text: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Each creature within 5 ft. of it must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: False Appearance
trait.text: While the mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary mound of magma.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
trait.text: The mephit can innately cast heat metal (spell save DC 10), requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

action.name: Claws
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft ., one creature. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) fire damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 6)
action.text: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Variant: Summon Mephits (1/Day)
action.text: The mephit has a 25 percent chance of summoning 1d4 mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

monster.name: Marid
monster.resist: acid, cold, lightning
monster.spells: create or destroy water, detect evil and good, detect magic, fog cloud, purify food and drink, tongues, water breathing, water walk, conjure elemental, control water, gaseous form, invisibility, plane shift

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: The marid can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Elemental Demise
trait.text: If the marid dies, its body disintegrates into a burst of water and foam, leaving behind only equipment the marid was wearing or carrying.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
trait.text:
The marid's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: create or destroy water, detect evil and good, detect magic, fog cloud, purify food and drink 3/day each: tongues, water breathing, water walk 1/day each: conjure elemental (water elemental only), control water, gaseous form, invisibility, plane shift

trait.name: Variant: Genie Powers
trait.text:
Genies have a variety of magical capabilities, including spells. A few have even greater powers that allow them to alter their appearance or the nature of reality.
Disguises. Some genies can veil themselves in illusion to pass as other similarly shaped creatures. Such genies can innately cast the disguise self spell at will, often with a longer duration than is normal for that spell. Mightier genies can cast the true polymorph spell one to three times per day, possibly with a longer duration than normal. Such genies can change only their own shape, but a rare few can use the spell on other creatures and objects as well. Wishes. The genie power to grant wishes is legendary among mortals. Only the most potent genies, such as those among the nobility, can do so. A particular genie that has this power can grant one to three wishes to a creature that isn't a genie. Once a genie has granted its limit of wishes, it can't grant wishes again for some amount of time (usually 1 year). and cosmic law dictates that the same genie can expend its limit of wishes on a specific creature only once in that creature's existence. To be granted a wish, a creature within 60 feet of the genie states a desired effect to it. The genie can then cast the wish spell on the creature's behalf to bring about the effect. Depending on the genie's nature, the genie might try to pervert the intent of the wish by exploiting the wish's poor wording. The perversion of the wording is usually crafted to be to the genie's benefit.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The marid makes two trident attacks.

action.name: Trident
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) piercing damage, or 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Water Jet
action.text: The marid magically shoots water in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and, if it is Huge or smaller, is pushed up to 20 feet away from the marid and knocked prone. On a success, a target takes half the bludgeoning damage, but is neither pushed nor knocked prone.

monster.name: Marilith
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The marilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: The marilith's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Reactive
trait.text: The marilith can take one reaction on every turn in combat.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The marilith can make seven attacks: six with its longswords and one with its tail.

action.name: Longsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the marilith can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the marilith can't make tail attacks against other targets.

action.name: Teleport
action.text: The marilith magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Variant: Summon Demon (1/Day)
action.text: The demon chooses what to summon and attempts a magical summoning. A marilith has a 50 percent chance of summoning 1d6 vrocks, 1d4 hezrous, 1d3 glabrezus, 1d2 nalfeshnees, or one marilith. A summoned demon appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other demons. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

reaction.name: Parry
reaction.text: The marilith adds 5 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the marilith must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

action.name: Claw
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
action.text: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 (16d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Master Thief
monster.skill: Acrobatics +7, Athletics +3, Perception +3, Sleight of Hand +7, Stealth +7
monster.languages: any one language (usually Common) plus thieves' cant

trait.name: Cunning Action
trait.text: On each of its turns, the thief can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Evasion
trait.text: If the thief is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the thief instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
trait.text: The thief deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the thief that isn’t incapacitated and the thief doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
action.text: The thief makes three attacks with its shortsword.

action.name: Shortsword
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.

action.name: Light Crossbow
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
reaction.text: The thief halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The thief must be able to see the attacker.

monster.name: Maw Demon
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning

trait.name: Rampage
trait.text: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the maw demon can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8+2) piercing damage.

monster.name: Mezzoloth
